banner.title: Partner with Lattice
banner.description: We don’t only want to invest in knowledge and fulfill the customers and developers needs – we want to give a platform to you as partner as well. We’re already teaming up with great names and experienced partners. If you need a platform – join us and benefit form a variety of advantages. We welcome you!

banner_blocks.content:
Since 1989 TRIAS mikroelektronik GmbH has been offering Electronic Design Automation (EDA) software product solutions in the fields of FPGA Design and IC Design, as well as for the design of wiring harness systems and on board networks.

Complementing these EDA (Electronic Design Automation) topics, our Application Lifecycle Management (ALM) and Product Lifecycle Management (PLM) solutions provide end-to-end monitoring and support of software applications and products throughout the complete mechatronic product development process.
